title: 判断玩家钓上了鱼
author: 蓝京
txt_content: 这个问题我想了很久实在想不出来

replies.txt_content:
首先丢两个doc
https://docs.windit.net/Chinese_ ... layerFishEvent.html
https://docs.windit.net/Chinese_ ... ishEvent.State.html

1) 先监听PlayerFishEvent
2) 利用监听器的getState()方法得到本次钓鱼的状态
3) 再利用equals或者==来判断是否是PlayerFishEvent.State.CAUGHT_FISH

replies.author: 蓝京
replies.txt_content:
